briefTitle: Chemoprevention Trial in Familial Adenomatous Polyposis (FAP) Coli Using EPA
officialTitle: A Two-Arm Chemoprevention Trial in Familial Adenomatous Polyposis (FAP) Coli Patients Using the Purified Free Fatty Acid, Eicosapentaenoic Acid

interventions.name: Endoscopy
otherNames: Endoscopy either Colonoscopy or Flexible sigmoidoscopy.

summary: This purpose of this study is to investigate whether the number and size of rectal polyps can be reduced in patients with Familial Adenomatous Polyposis (FAP) by using a highly-purified form of a naturally occurring substance, the omega-3 fatty acid, eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA).

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in the Number of Polyps Measured in a Focal Area of the Rectum.
